column5: This lake house is the perfect private get away. Bring your family, book club or girls group for a vacation in Granbury. This house is on a large lot with a trail through a private wooded area with stairs leading to the boat dock on beautiful lake Granbury. Sit on the deck or boat dock and enjoy a beverage and take in  the amazing views. Granbury has a wonderful historic square with tons of shopping and great restaurants.
